MERS.QA.long_name: Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C.
MERS.QA.summary: Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail trade of various types of consumer goods commodities in Qatar and the Sultanate of Oman. It operates through three segments: Retail, Investment, and Leasing. The company sells foodstuff, household items and garments, stationery, computer accessories, books, and toys; owns and manages consumer outlets; holds equity and funds in the form of financial assets; and rents shops in various malls. It also establishes and operates shopping centers, supermarkets, and hypermarkets; and offers warehousing and delivery truck services. As of March 28, 2021, the company operated 58 stores. Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
